meanings.definition: A large herbivorous dinosaur of the genus Iguanodon.
meanings.sent1: The iguanodon had sharp teeth for eating plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered an iguanodon fossil in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The iguanodon tried to eat a whole tree but got stuck!
meanings.sent4: Herbivores like the iguanodon are like gentle giants of the past.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about the iguanodon's plant-based diet.

meanings.definition: A fossilized skeleton of an iguanodon.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a complete iguanodon skeleton.
meanings.sent2: Excavators carefully unearthed the iguanodon fossil.
meanings.sent3: The iguanodon skeleton seemed to wave at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The iguanodon fossil was a snapshot frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The iguanodon's skeleton was a puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: The iguanodon roamed the Earth during the early Cretaceous period.
meanings.sent1: Long ago, the iguanodon wandered through lush forests.
meanings.sent2: The iguanodon was a majestic creature of ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The iguanodon threw a party for all the other dinosaurs!
meanings.sent4: In stories, the iguanodon symbolizes a time of great change.
meanings.sent5: The iguanodon's footsteps left a mark on history.
